casebody.data:
Thompson, Appellee, v. Irwin Company, Appellant.

[Cite as Thompson v. Irwin Co. (1988), 39 Ohio St. 3d 341.]

(No. 88-1413 — Submitted September 21, 1988 — Decided November 9, 1988.) James R. Nein, for appellee. Rendigs, Fry, Kiely & Dennis and Edward R. Goldman, for appellant.

Appellant’s motion to certify the record is allowed. The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on authority of Van Fossen v. Babcock & Wilcox Co. (1988), 36 Ohio St. 3d 100, 522 N.E. 2d 489.

Moyer, C.J., Locher, Holmes, Wright and H. Brown, JJ., concur. Sweeney, J., dissents. Douglas, J., not participating.
